Flavor: I suppose it is ironic that for so many decades we've been kept safe by our relative seclusion from the rest of Sanctuary. Now it will be our downfall. I can hear my fellow monks screaming beyond the doors.  Monk Miatin is rallying those of us that are left; we cannot allow the knowledge to leave. What else can I do? I will fight.
Description: Written by a monk of the Orbei Monastery, in a thin hand.
Name: Blood-Soaked Handwritten Missive
